query.statement:
SELECT A.CS145_SCD , A.CS145_ARA , B.CTEXT2 ARA_NM , A.CS145_SCP , A.CS145_TEL , A.CS145_FAX , A.CS145_ADR , A.CS145_CNT , A.CS145_RMK , CASE WHEN A.CS145_USE = 'Y' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END CS145_USE , '' FLAG
, CS145_GSO --Ãß°¡(2020.02.20)
FROM SAPHEE.ZCST145 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE B ON B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND B.CODE1 = 'CS115' AND B.CODE2 = A.CS145_ARA AND B.LANG = 'ko'
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND A.CS145_ARA = #ARA#
AND A.CS145_SCP LIKE '%'||#SCP#||'%'
AND A.CS145_ADR LIKE '%'||#ADR#||'%'
WITH UR
